channel.title: Intro dialougue [delta]
channel.description:
okay so i am running on crazy pvp's source(a delta) and i need a code for when a player logs in for the first time an npc (i dont give a damn which) says something like "welcome to nightmarescape PvP!"(click to continue) "the basic commands are: ~::master,::pickup,and ::home" (click to continue) "for any other questions please refer to the nightmarescape staff or experienced players" i know that is probably a lot to ask,but ive been coding for like 3 hrs straight now and my head hurts really bad,so it would be very much appreciated
~thanks in advance! -nightmare2013
